name: Fanfiction.net - Make text selectable again.
description:
A recent update has made it impossible to select text when you're on a story page. This script allows you to select text on stories again.
Edit 13/10/2013 - Fanfiction.net has updated it's css to stop the old version of this style working. This edit just makes it work again.
additional_info: I've only tested this on the actual chapter pages, so if there are any other areas that are preventing you from selecting text, please let me know.
